items.title: Centum Electronics rallies 11% on QIP cheer, plans to move up in defence value chain
items.description: The EDSM player is 'actively exploring' opportunities in high-value programs in an effort to expand margin and aim for the global market.

items.title: Should you look at IndusInd Bank facing multiple challenges?
items.description: Given the lingering uncertainty with the top management and repeated accidents, a valuation rerating is unlikely in the near term

items.title: Sun Pharma: Checkpoint acquisition strengthens speciality portfolio
items.description: In the near term, pricing pressure in generics and moderation in contribution from Revlimid is a key watch, along with potential tariff announcements by the US

items.title: Govt looking to boost solar cell component manufacturing after industry flags import concerns
items.description: For now, the government may focus on wafers and ingots while allowing polysilicon to be imported, as India doesn’t have the capacity to produce the ultra-refined material

items.title: Aveo's top executive says no illegal exports of banned drug combinations, blames counterfeiters
items.description: Arvind Sharma, Managing Director told Moneycontrol that the exports were done only after getting valid product permissions from the State FDA and required export no-objection certificates

items.title: Sakthi Aircraft Industry to make trainer planes in India
items.description: The deal is for having 200 trainer DA40 NG planes and out of them, 150 aircraft will be assembled at Sakthi Aircraft Industry’s planned facility, which is likely to be set up in Haryana, Sakthi Aircraft MD & CEO Vaibhav D said

items.title: CG Power gets Rs 450 crore order to manufacture products for Vande Bharat trainsets
items.description: The first purchase order, ranging between Rs 400-450 crore, has been secured by the company for supply of railway products for 10 Vande Bharat trainsets.

items.title: Nykaa sets up subsidiary for beauty and personal care in a bet on rising beauty consumption
items.description: Premiumization of the beauty category has been a focus area for the company in the past several quarters, and Nykaa has said that it wants to continue to invest in the space.

items.title: Bharti Airtel signs pact with SpaceX to bring Starlink's high-speed internet to India
items.description: The agreement sets the stage for Airtel and SpaceX to further explore how both companies can enhance business offerings.

items.title: Government scouts for CMDs for India's biggest power sector firms
items.description: The appointments will come at a time when India is pulling out all the stops to meet its growing power demand with focus on renewable and nuclear energy

items.title: Zydus Lifesciences to acquire French medtech Amplitude Surgical for Rs 2,447 crore
items.description: The acquisition will help Zydus diversify into medtech, leveraging Amplitude’s market presence, R&D, and global distribution network

items.title: Race for Haldiram: Temasek may shortly reach final pact to buy around 9% stake at around $10 bn valuation
items.description: Blackstone and Alpha Wave Capital are the other suitors who have expressed interest earlier in the transaction

items.title: TCS to acquire 100% stake in Darshita Southern India Happy Homes for Rs 2,250 crore
items.description: The Tata group firm will also acquire the land and the building of the commercial real estate firm, turning it into a delivery centre for the tech giant, the stock filing said

items.title: AGS Transact Technologies moves half of its ATMs back to banks
items.description: The company and its units owe a total of 7.19 billion rupees ($82.5 million) to its creditors including State Bank of India and Axis Bank

items.title: PB Fintech to invest Rs 696 crore in arm PB Healthcare Services
items.description: According to a regulatory filing,  PB Fintech would be holding up to 33.63% on a fully diluted basis.

items.title: Adani set to bag $4.1 billion Mumbai housing project
items.description: The Maharashtra state government will shortly issue a Letter of Intent to Adani Properties, formally declaring it as the winner, Bloomberg reported citing sources

items.title: Nvidia confronts increasing competition as AI inference emerges as new frontier
items.description: Nvidia faces rising competition in AI inference as rivals like DeepSeek, Cerebras, and Big Tech firms target the growing market, challenging its dominance amid shifting computing demands.
